login.check_email_message: We sent an email to you at <1>{{email}}</1>. <2 />Please click the magic link in the email to sign in.

validation.email_invalid: Email must be a valid email address

status.account_disabled: Single sign-on is not enabled on your account. Please contact your Fleet administrator.
status.account_invalid: You do not have a Fleet account.
status.org_disabled: Single sign-on is not enabled for your organization.
status.error: There was an error with single sign-on. Please contact your Fleet administrator.

forgot_password.instructions: Enter your email below to receive an email with instructions to reset your password.
forgot_password.success_message: An email was sent to <1>{{email}}</1>. Click the link in the email to proceed with the password reset process. If you did not receive an email please contact your Fleet administrator.
forgot_password.success_additional_info: You can find more information on resetting passwords at the

reset_password.description: Create a new password. Your new password must include 12-48 characters, at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9), and at least 1 symbol (e.g. &*#)
reset_password.new_password_help: 12-48 characters, with at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9) and 1 symbol (e.g. &*#).

validation.new_password_required: New password field must be completed
validation.confirm_password_required: New password confirmation field must be completed
